pageDescription: Find your healthcare provider among MHTC's Elite and Ordinary Partners

hero.title: MHTC Members
hero.subtitle: Find your healthcare provider among MHTC's Elite and Ordinary Partners

elitePartners.title: MHTC Elite Partner Membership
elitePartners.description: MHTC Elite Partners represent the most prestigious private healthcare institutions in the country. All Elite Partners are accredited by international healthcare accreditation agencies and a select few are recognized for Specialty Care Quality or Health (SCQH), the Malaysian Society for Quality in Health (MSQH), the Australian Council on Healthcare and Standards (ACHS), Baldis International and Planetree for Technological Accreditation Committee (PTAC).

ordinaryMembers.title: MHTC Ordinary Member
ordinaryMembers.description: A selective committee consisting of representatives from both the private and government sector stringently evaluates and select those medical providers to ensure that standards of service and quality medical care provided within the industry are continuously upheld. These hospitals also possess at least one accreditation from international healthcare accreditation and represent the face of Malaysia Healthcare.
